A

act() - Method in class game.Beaker
Moves the Beaker from left to right, or right to left if it hits the right wall.
act(long) - Method in class game.BeakerWorld
 
act() - Method in class game.LiquidDrop
Allows for the LiquidDrop to fall, resetting the y position every millisecond.
act() - Method in class gameEngine.Actor
This method is called every frame of the game.
act(long) - Method in class gameEngine.World
This method is called every frame once start has been called.
Actor - Class in gameEngine
Actor is an abstract base class for general sprites in an arcade style game.
Actor() - Constructor for class gameEngine.Actor
Creates a new Actor with a question mark image and a starting location of (0, 0).
Actor(Image) - Constructor for class gameEngine.Actor
Creates a new Actor with the specified image and a starting location of (0, 0).
Actor(double, double, Image) - Constructor for class gameEngine.Actor
Creates a new Actor with the specified image and the specified start location.
add(Actor) - Method in class gameEngine.World
Adds the given Actor to the world.
addModelListener(ModelListener) - Method in class game.Model
Adds the specified ModelListener to the game.
